name: The Mega Mister Monster Man
description:
A monster has come to destroy your city....he has plans...but you have the power of an extremely dumb army of weird-star-shaped-thingy's who can fight off the monster. The question is though....will it work?

You play as the monster in this game...trying to escape the 'Enemies' who have come to kill you. Again, small game, please don't give hate, Thank You! :)

Oh and by the way, I will be uploading projects that actually have audio soon. Thanks!

Also, if it says that the project shouldn't be downloaded cuz it has viruses, I can assure you it has absolutely none.
